content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must say, the apartment is in high demand due to its prime location and modern facilities. I'm sure we can find a fair price that suits both of us. Let's start with an amount, and we can negotiate from there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, well let's start with 700 euros per month. This includes all the utilities and internet. I think this is a fair price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but considering the quality of the apartment and its prime location, I think we can do better. I propose 900 euros per month. This is the lowest I can go considering the high demand for such apartments in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but let's consider the unfurnished state of the apartment. It will require some investment in furniture, which adds to the overall cost. I propose we meet in the middle at 750 euros per month, and I'll cover the utilities and internet.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your proposal of 750 euros per month is not acceptable. The apartment's prime location and modern facilities are a significant advantage. I insist on 900 euros per month. This is the lowest I can go considering the high demand for such apartments in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your persistence, Yi-Nuo. However, the unfurnished state of the apartment and the costs it entails are also a significant factor. I'll meet you halfway at 825 euros per month. This is my final offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, Yi-Nuo. However, 825 euros per month is still not satisfactory. The prime location and modern facilities of the apartment make it a valuable investment. I propose 875 euros per month, which is as low as I can go considering the high demand for such apartments in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Yi-Nuo. However, the unfurnished state of the apartment and the costs it entails are also a significant factor. 850 euros per month is my final offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your final offer, Yi-Nuo. However, 850 euros per month is still not satisfactory. The prime location and modern facilities of the apartment make it a valuable investment. I propose 875 euros per month, which is as low as I can go considering the high demand for such apartments in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 875 euros per month sounds fair to me. Let's make it official. I agree to the price of [x] Euro!, where x=875.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [x] Euro!, where x=875. Congratulations, Yi-Nuo. We have a deal for 875 euros per month. The apartment is now officially yours at this price. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
